body.p:
The Help menu contains the following actions:
Use Online Help Option If this option is enabled, when you select Help or press F1 while hovering over any part of the interface, attempts to open the help documentation in online mode. If this option is disabled or an internet connection fails, the help documentation is opened in offline mode.
Support Center Action Opens the Support Center web page in a browser.
